main_title: Sicilian Knights' Last Stand: A Bloody Revolt
hook: [dramatic] You won't believe how a simple uprising turned into a bloody last stand! In 1282, the Sicilian Vespers erupted against French rule, igniting chaos.
description: In 1282, Sicilian knights defied 20,000 French troops in a shocking last stand. Could betrayal change the tide? #SicilianVespers #History #Knights
